Comments_List: I gained a comprehensive knowledge of the history of Puerto Rico and valuable skills in primary source research.
I gained invaluable insight into the history of Puerto Ricos relationship with the US and the memorable events that shaped it.

I believe the course discussion could be made more lively if guided by the Professor in a more Socratic fashion, although it is very informative in the structure it has currently. Overall, the course covers a lot of ground and is very profound. Strongly recommend.
The professor still often ran the course as a lecture, even though there were only 9 students in the class. I would have appreciated more time to discuss the readings in seminar style.
The greatest strenght is its professor! Collado-Schwartz is spectacular and provides great discussions.

Definitely. The course explores a topic rarely taught at American universities and does a great job at exploring the political uniqueness of Puerto Rico from the point of view of an insider. Prof. Collado Schwarz is a font of knowledge.
Yes. The history of Puerto Rico is a very tricky subject to teach but the professor did a great job!
